description: NodeScan is a specification for a NodeScan resource

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: Spec defines the desired state of NodeScan

node.description: Node is the target node to run scan job

status.description: Status defines the observed state of NodeScan

completionTime.description: CompletionTime is the completion timestamp of the scan task.

items.description: NodeScanCondition describes current state of a NodeScan.

lastProbeTime.description: Last time the condition was checked.

message.description: Human readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: (brief) reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type of NodeScan condition, Succeed or Failed.

items.description: Result is the check result on the target node

policy.description: Policy is the name or identifier of the policy

result.description: Result indicates the outcome of the policy rule execution

severity.description: Severity indicates policy check result criticality

startTime.description: StartTime is the start timestamp of the scan task.
